item.title: Everything you need to know about Kevin Warsh, Trump's pick to lead the Federal Reserve
item.description: Kevin Warsh, a former Fed governor, has emerged as Donald Trump’s pick to lead the Federal Reserve. Here’s his background, views and why it matters.

item.title: Trump nominates Kevin Warsh for Federal Reserve chair to succeed Jerome Powell
item.description: President Trump on Friday named Kevin Warsh to succeed Jerome Powell as Fed chair, ending an odyssey that has seen unprecedented turmoil around the ce...

item.title: If you missed big international stock market rally in 2025, it's not too late to start making money overseas
item.description: International markets boomed in 2025 and investing experts say plenty of opportunity remains for stock gains overseas from metals to tech to banking.

item.title: Trump finally makes his Fed chair pick — What Kevin Warsh means for investors
item.description: Investors see the former Fed governor as a credible steward of monetary policy despite expectations he may push for lower rates.
